name: Spotlight Collection
description: Discover luxury and sophistication with our handpicked collection, designed to make a statement. Elevate your wardrobe with timeless pieces that embody elegance. Redefine your style with our featured collection

name: Women's Ethnics
description: Discover elegant ethnic wear for women, including sarees, kurtas, and salwar suits. Explore traditional designs and fine craftsmanship, perfect for any occasion

name: Men's Fashion
description: Discover stylish men's ethnic wear, including kurtas, sherwanis, and Nehru jackets. Perfect for festive occasions and special events
